events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about receiving the wrong product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and contact the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I’ll assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I have attached a photo showing the item that doesn’t match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the effort to resolve my issue.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please allow a few days for the amount to appear in your account.
We’re following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not heard back, we will now close this refund case. Please contact us again if you have further questions.
